item.title: How to Install Google Tag Manager on WordPress by Manually
item.description: This is my maiden article in English. Writing a simple tutorial on a popular topic is my way that hopefully to get broad viewers further. I want to give a simple tutorial about how to install Google Tag Manager on WordPress by editing themes directly. This tutorial is suitable for you if your themes donâ€™t have any features to add any extra tracking. This usually happens with free WordPress themes.
